Class.name: ReportZEN.genRptDop1

<page title="Настройки экрана для запуска отчета">
<hgroup> <vgroup valign="top"> <pane paneName="SpisReports"/> <spacer height="20"/> </vgroup> <spacer width="20"/> <vgroup width="100%" valign="top"> <pane paneName="ReportMainData"/> <spacer height="20"/> <pane paneName="ReportParams"/> <spacer height="20"/> <hgroup> <pane paneName="detailParam" valign="top"/> <spacer width="20"/> <pane paneName="detailParam2" valign="top"/> </hgroup> </vgroup> </hgroup>
</page>
